Description: Ostracon, large section of the shoulder of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and very faint traces of red-painted Coptic characters with a number of lines of cord-marked decoration beneath.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394120) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394120)
